entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind light except east 30 km/h gusting to 50 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 25. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 40 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 near midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of snow. Low minus 22. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023
